name: THEOliveSDK
summary: The THEOlive SDK provides HTTP-based, low latency streaming to any number of iOS devices.
description: Interactive entertainment, sports betting, iGaming, ... can rely on the HTTP-based streaming API of THEOlive to scale their low latency video services to a global audience, enabling cutting-edge video to any iOS device in the world. For more info, please visit https://www.theoplayer.com/product/theolive
